result.arabic_text: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوۡفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا
result.translation: 87. Dilqharneyni iyyeh: isi nafsi yudlumeeh isi Rabbil koroosite numuy tirto keenik cineh tu- gactek, toysa sarroh addunyal kaa digaalenno, tohuk lakat Rabe leeh isi Rabbí fan gacsime-leeh jahannam girah addal kaxxa digaalay diriggaleh kaa digaale-le.
